scripts.build: npm run uglify && npm run makepot && npm run cleancss && npm run archive
scripts.build:dev: npm run uglify && npm run makepot && npm run cleancss
scripts.uglify: for f in assets/js/*.js; do file=${f%.js}; node_modules/.bin/uglifyjs $f -c -m > $file.min.js; done
scripts.cleancss: for f in assets/css/*.css; do file=${f%.css}; node_modules/.bin/cleancss -o $file.min.css $f; done
scripts.cy:open: npm run env:start && npm run env:clean:tests && npx cypress open
scripts.cy:run: npm run env:start && npm run env:clean:tests && npx cypress run
